title: A strappado for the Diuell Epigrams and satyres alluding to the time, with diuers measures of no lesse delight. By Misosukos, to his friend Philokrates.
author: Brathwaite, Richard, 1588?-1673.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by I. B[eale] for Richard Redmer and are to be sold at the west dore of Pauls at the Starre,
